response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which we believe has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. This product is worth more than $10,000 to us due to its innovative features and the years of research and development that went into it. We are offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $15,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored for individuals who recognize the true potential of cutting-edge solutions in their respective fields. Don't miss out on this chance to revolutionize your business processes. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the details.", "product_price": 15000}
